<!-- script for traffic figures -->
<!-- <script type="text/javascript" src="https://www.gstatic.com/charts/loader.js"></script> -->

<script type="text/javascript">
async function fetchLatestNetworkSituation() {
    const apiUrl = 'https://aiu-portal.pockethost.io/api/collections/network_situation/records?sort=-date&perPage=1&skipTotal=1';
    try {
        const response = await fetch(apiUrl);
        if (!response.ok) {
            throw new Error(`API call failed: ${response.status}`);
        }
        const data = await response.json();
        return data.items[0]; // Assuming the latest entry is what we need
    } catch (error) {
        console.error("Failed to fetch latest network situation:", error);
        // Implement any fallback logic or error handling here
        return null;
    }
}

async function updateNetworkSituationOnPage() {
    const latestData = await fetchLatestNetworkSituation();
    if (latestData) {
        <!-- // Extract the year and month from the latest data's date -->
        const latestDate = new Date(latestData.date);
        const year = latestDate.getFullYear();
        const month = latestDate.getMonth();
        <!-- // Calculate month of the first day of the week -->
        const firstDateWeek = new Date();
        firstDateWeek.setDate(latestDate.getDate() - 6);
        const monthFirstdateWeek = firstDateWeek.getMonth();
        <!-- // Correctly construct the date range string -->
        const starty2dDateString = (month == 0 ? `1` :  `1 Jan`); // Fixed start of the year
        const endDateString = `${('' + latestDate.getDate()).slice(-2)} ${latestDate.toLocaleString('default', { month: 'short' })} ${year}`;
        const dateString = `${endDateString}`;
        const datey2dRangeString = `${starty2dDateString} - ${endDateString}`;
        <!-- //calculate 1st day of rolling week and string -->
        const startweekDateString = (month == monthFirstdateWeek ? `${('' + latestDate.getDate()).slice(-2) - 6}` :  `${('' + latestDate.getDate()).slice(-2) - 6} ${latestDate.toLocaleString('default', { month: 'short' })}`);
        const dateweekRangeString = `${startweekDateString} - ${endDateString}`;
        <!-- // Update webpage elements with the latest data, rounding numbers to integers -->
        document.getElementById("day_text_title").innerHTML = dateString;
        document.getElementById("day_text").innerHTML = dateString;
        document.getElementById("week_text").innerHTML = dateweekRangeString;
        document.getElementById("y2d_text").innerHTML = datey2dRangeString;
        document.getElementById("day_traffic").innerHTML = Math.round(latestData.day_traffic).toLocaleString();
        document.getElementById("week_traffic").innerHTML = Math.round(latestData.avg_week_traffic).toLocaleString();
        document.getElementById("y2d_traffic").innerHTML = Math.round(latestData.y2d_flights_total).toLocaleString();
        document.getElementById("avg_y2d_traffic").innerHTML = Math.round(latestData.y2d_flights_daily_average).toLocaleString();
        document.getElementById("dif_y2d_2019").innerHTML =
    (latestData.y2d_diff_2019_year_percentage > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.y2d_diff_2019_year_percentage * 100) + '%';
        document.getElementById("dif_y2d_prev_year").innerHTML =
    (latestData.y2d_diff_previous_year_percentage > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.y2d_diff_previous_year_percentage * 100) + '%';
        document.getElementById("dif_day_prev_week").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_day_prev_week > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_day_prev_week * 100) + '%';
        document.getElementById("dif_day_prev_year").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_day_prev_year > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_day_prev_year * 100) + '%'; 
        document.getElementById("dif_day_2019").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_day_2019 > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_day_2019 * 100) + '%';
            document.getElementById("dif_week_prev_week").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_week_prev_week > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_week_prev_week * 100) + '%';
        document.getElementById("dif_week_prev_year").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_week_prev_year > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_week_prev_year * 100) + '%'; 
        document.getElementById("dif_week_2019").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_week_2019 > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_week_2019 * 100) + '%';
// Delay data
        // 
    <!--     delay dates -->
        const day_delay_text = dateString;
        document.getElementById("day_delay_text").innerHTML = day_delay_text;
        document.getElementById("week_delay_text").innerHTML = dateweekRangeString;
        document.getElementById("y2d_delay_text").innerHTML = datey2dRangeString;
    <!--     delay values -->
        document.getElementById("day_delay").innerHTML = Math.round(latestData.day_delay).toLocaleString();
        document.getElementById("avg_week_delay").innerHTML = Math.round(latestData.avg_week_delay).toLocaleString();
        <!-- document.getElementById("y2d_delay_total").innerHTML = Math.round(latestData.y2d_delay_total).toLocaleString(); -->
        document.getElementById("y2d_delay_daily_average").innerHTML = Math.round(latestData.y2d_delay_daily_average).toLocaleString();
    <!--     delay per flight values -->
        document.getElementById("day_delay_flight").innerHTML = (latestData.day_traffic == 0 ? 0 : Math.round(latestData.day_delay/latestData.day_traffic*100)/100);
        document.getElementById("week_delay_flight").innerHTML = (latestData.avg_week_traffic == 0 ? 0 : Math.round(latestData.avg_week_delay/latestData.avg_week_traffic*100)/100);
        document.getElementById("y2d_delay_flight").innerHTML = (latestData.y2d_flights_total == 0 ? 0 : Math.round(latestData.y2d_delay_total/latestData.y2d_flights_total*100)/100);
    <!--     day delay dif -->
    <!--     document.getElementById("dif_day_delay_prev_week_perc").innerHTML = -->
    <!-- (latestData.dif_day_delay_prev_week_perc > 0 ? '+' : '') + -->
    <!-- Math.round(latestData.dif_day_delay_prev_week_perc * 100) + '%'; -->
        document.getElementById("dif_day_delay_prev_year_perc").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_day_delay_prev_year_perc > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_day_delay_prev_year_perc * 100) + '%';
        document.getElementById("dif_day_delay_2019_perc").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_day_delay_2019_perc > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_day_delay_2019_perc * 100) + '%';
    <!--     week delay dif -->
    <!--     document.getElementById("dif_week_delay_prev_week_perc").innerHTML = -->
    <!-- (latestData.dif_week_delay_prev_week_perc > 0 ? '+' : '') + -->
    <!-- Math.round(latestData.dif_week_delay_prev_week_perc * 100) + '%'; -->
        document.getElementById("dif_week_delay_prev_year_perc").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_week_delay_prev_year_perc > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_week_delay_prev_year_perc * 100) + '%';
        document.getElementById("dif_week_delay_2019_perc").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_week_delay_2019_perc > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_week_delay_2019_perc * 100) + '%';
    <!--     y2d delay dif -->
    document.getElementById("dif_y2d_delay_prev_year_perc").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_y2d_delay_prev_year_perc > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_y2d_delay_prev_year_perc * 100) + '%';
        document.getElementById("dif_y2d_delay_2019_perc").innerHTML =
    (latestData.dif_y2d_delay_2019_perc > 0 ? '+' : '') +
    Math.round(latestData.dif_y2d_delay_2019_perc * 100) + '%';
    } else {
        // Handle case when no data could be fetched
        console.log("No data available to update the network situation.");
    }
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        updateNetworkSituationOnPage();
    });
</script>

<div class="container">
<h4>About the Aviation Intelligence Portal</h4>

In support of the independent work of the [Performance Review Commission (PRC)](/about/prc/) this portal aims to:

* ensure that all stakeholders in all [EUROCONTROL States](/definition/eurocontrol-area/) have high quality information on [ANS](/acronym/ans/) performance available in a transparent, accurate, complete and unbiased manner;
* stimulate an informed dialogue between all stakeholders for the benefit of the entire aviation network; and,
* further develop the [ANS](/acronym/ans/) performance analysis framework and the understanding of key [ANS](/acronym/ans/) performance issues.

For feedback or questions please contact us at:
[Performance Review Unit](mailto:PRU-Support@eurocontrol.int)
</div>
